        public long magicNumber()
        Returns the signature (magic number) of the object this handles.

        If this object's signature hasn't been initialized then it will return a default value of -1.
        Returns:
        the signature of the object this handles

      • addDescription

        public Work addDescription(java.lang.String desc)
        Adds a description for the entire object and removes the automatic description feature.

        Normally the description will appeared on the left of the progress bar that this object will draw.
        Parameters:
        desc - the description for this object
        Returns:
        itself

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Main run function, overloading Thread.run().
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - whenever there is more than 1 type of work in here (both FUNC and EXP)
        java.lang.RuntimeException - whenever the user has not specified enough arguments when the object is executing several methods
        java.lang.RuntimeException - whenever the user is trying to multithreadedly run several methods. This feature is not supported
        java.lang.RuntimeException - whenever other threads have interrupted this thread while it is sleeping
